Aug. 23, 1924 D West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Class C)
West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Class C) 520 Test Piece Contest West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Bugle) west-of-england-bandsmen-s-festival-class-c

Recitative: 'Comfort ye my people' and Chorus: 'And the Glory of the Lord', from 'The Messiah'
Peniel Farm, Bugle, Cornwall, England, UK As 1922 - seemingly an open section.
The "Chorus Competition". Another newspaper report gives Falmouth Town 2nd place, winning the Bolitho shield and a tenor slide trombone.
